sentences.english: Objective To explore the regularity of axonal injury in experimental hydrocephalus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦積水中軸索損傷的發展變化規律。

sentences.english: Disproportionate head measurements may indicate hydrocephaly or microcephaly .
sentences.chinese: 比例不符的頭圍可能表示腦積水或小頭畸形。

sentences.english: The stench of the old rain water in the shade the never seemed to evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 陰暗處的惡臭的積水，像是永遠也不會蒸發。

sentences.english: Are plugs of compacted soil produced through aeration of fairways loose impediments?
sentences.chinese: 球道中積水井蓋上散落的淤泥算不算散置障礙物？

sentences.english: If valley flashings are too narrow, backed-up water can find its way under the roofing materials.
sentences.chinese: 如果天溝過於窄的話，積水將滲透屋面材料。

sentences.english: Water collected in the pit left when the old trees were uprooted.
sentences.chinese: 老樹被連根拔起後留下的坑會積水。

sentences.english: We walk through the ponding with hard under the fierce storm.
sentences.chinese: 我們在狂烈的風雨中，艱難地跋涉過積水。

sentences.english: Water jar seeper stops to prevent in the shop, upend is worn.
sentences.chinese: 商店裏爲了防止水缸積水，都是倒放着的。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the possible causes of hydrocephalus after severe traumatic head injury and the experience of the treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析重型顱腦損傷後腦積水的原因和治療體會。

sentences.english: In some places the water reached nine-and-a-half kilometers inland.
sentences.chinese: 有些內陸地區，積水縱深長達九公里半。

sentences.english: Water it thoroughly and deeply, but avoid keeping the soil soggy.
sentences.chinese: 水要澆透澆深，但要避免土壤積水。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of hyperbaric therapy on endolymphatic hydrops in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中耳加壓治療是否可抑制豚鼠內淋巴積水。

sentences.english: Discard stuffed toys, water -logged toys and non-cleanable toys .
sentences.chinese: 丟棄被水泡脹，有積水或無法清潔的玩具。

sentences.english: Tom:If you're taking the subway, get off at Jishuitan.
sentences.chinese: 坐地鐵的話，到積水潭站下就可以了。

sentences.english: Can colonic cancer cause lobar seeper?
sentences.chinese: 結腸癌會引發肺積水嗎？

sentences.english: The difference of the above two means the storm water accumulation at each runoff catchment area.
sentences.chinese: 兩者之差就是城市各雨水徑流流域暴雨的積水量。
